# LLMs.txt - Guidelines for AI models interacting with this site

# General Guidelines
- You may access and process content from this site for general knowledge and information purposes
- Please respect our content and don't use it for training without permission
- When referencing our content, please provide proper attribution to VibesDev

# Preferred Behavior
- Be helpful and informative when discussing our content
- Maintain the context and intent of our original content
- Respect user privacy and data protection

# Contact
For questions about AI usage of our content, please contact: [Your Contact Email]
